contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Understanding Content Security Policy (CSP) and Its Importance
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription: Kentico MVP, Liam Goldfinch, educates about the benefits of a Content Security Policy (CSP), shows some technical examples, and finishes things up with a surprise ending... he authored an open-source custom module for managing CSPs in Xperience by Kentico!
